original: @38b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @38b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sragdhar sto tra /
analyzed: sragdhar sto tra /
translated: Sragdharastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa //
analyzed: phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa //
translated: The Praise of the One Who Holds a Garland

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Tara!

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba ltar dmar lha mchog rnams kyi mgo yi gtsug gi nor bu'i dpal //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba ltar dmar lha mchog rnams kyi mgo yi gtsug gi nor bu'i dpal //
translated: Red like the glow of the rising sun, the glory of the crest jewels of the supreme gods,

original: phun sum tshogs pas dmar ba smug rtsi gsal po dngar bkod shin tu yun rings ma lon 'dra'i //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pas dmar ba smug rtsi gsal po dngar bkod shin tu yun rings ma lon 'dra'i //
translated: Clear like a fresh vermilion painting, as if not long applied,

original: 'phags ma khyod zhabs dag la thal sbyar cod pan gyis mnan yan lag mchog btud bdag gis ni //
analyzed: 'phags ma khyod zhabs dag la thal sbyar cod pan gyis mnan yan lag mchog btud bdag gis ni //
translated: With my head bowed to your feet, O Noble One, with my limbs folded in homage,

original: gus pas sgrol ma phongs skyabs bstod pa gser gyi me tog phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par bgyi //
analyzed: gus pas sgrol ma phongs skyabs bstod pa gser gyi me tog phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par bgyi //
translated: I respectfully praise Tara, the refuge of the distressed, and offer golden flower garlands.

original: skad ngan du ba'i bzhin ldan rgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me la lus dag rnam ltung ba //
analyzed: skad ngan du ba'i bzhin ldan rgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me la lus dag rnam ltung ba //
translated: With a face of wailing smoke, my body falls into the fire of suffering, difficult to cross,

original: ci dang ci bya zhes rmongs lan gcig min pa'i rtsom pa byas kyang 'bras dang bral bas skyo //
analyzed: ci dang ci bya zhes rmongs lan gcig min pa'i rtsom pa byas kyang 'bras dang bral bas skyo //
translated: Confused about what to do, though I have repeatedly begun, I am weary, having no result.

original: mkha' la nyi zla'i dpal ni gzhan las mang du thos nas blta bar re ba bcas gyur pa'i //
analyzed: mkha' la nyi zla'i dpal ni gzhan las mang du thos nas blta bar re ba bcas gyur pa'i //
translated: The sun and moon, whose glory is renowned in the heavens, are seen by all, and all hope to see them.üîΩBut I, like one blind from birth, have looked upon the world of men.

original: mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gro ba lta bu bdag ni sdig 'joms khyed la gus bas rten par bgyid //
analyzed: mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gro ba lta bu bdag ni sdig 'joms khyed la gus bas rten par bgyid //
translated: With reverence I have taken refuge in you, O Destroyer of Evil.

original: khyed kyi thugs rje sems can rnams ni kun la bye brag med par 'jug pa ma lags sam //
analyzed: khyed kyi thugs rje sems can rnams ni kun la bye brag med par 'jug pa ma lags sam //
translated: Is it not true that your compassion extends to all living beings without distinction?

original: de dag gzung bas bdag 'dra yang ni de dag nang du gzung bar 'gyur la gdon mi za //
analyzed: de dag gzung bas bdag 'dra yang ni de dag nang du gzung bar 'gyur la gdon mi za //
translated: There is no doubt that I, too, am included in your mercy.

original: mtha' dag 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i mun par tsha zer can gzugs nus pa la yang do zla med //
analyzed: mtha' dag 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i mun par tsha zer can gzugs nus pa la yang do zla med //
translated: The sun, with all its power, cannot penetrate the darkness of the sins of all beings.

original: de lta mod kyi kye ma bdag smad nyes byas ngan pas brjid cing sdug bsngal ldan pa nyid //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi kye ma bdag smad nyes byas ngan pas brjid cing sdug bsngal ldan pa nyid //
translated: Alas, I am the most wretched of men, the most miserable of the miserable.

original: skal ba zhan pa bdag smad smad pa zhig ste nyin byed 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa sel //üîΩgangs can las byung 'jug ngogs chus dkrigs pa yi dum bu @39a * //
analyzed: skal ba zhan pa bdag smad smad pa zhig ste nyin byed 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa sel // gangs can las byung 'jug ngogs chus dkrigs pa yi dum bu @39a * //
translated: The sun, with all its rays, cannot dispel the darkness of my sins.üîΩThe water of a mountain stream,üîΩchilled by its passage over snow and rocks,

original: 'khyags shing bsil ba dag tu bsgom //
analyzed: 'khyags shing bsil ba dag tu bsgom //
translated: is refreshing to the body.

original: rin chen gling gi lam srang dang ni nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa dag gi nang du dbul //
analyzed: rin chen gling gi lam srang dang ni nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa dag gi nang du dbul //
translated: In the streets of the Jewel Island, in the spacious grottoes of the gems, in the houses,

original: 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma khyod mgon du byas kyang mgon ma mchis so bcom ldan ma //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma khyod mgon du byas kyang mgon ma mchis so bcom ldan ma //
translated: you are the mother of the whole world, the one protectress, the Blessed One.

original: nu ma'i rgyu las lan mang dag tu rnam par du ba'i bu lam yang skyo bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nu ma'i rgyu las lan mang dag tu rnam par du ba'i bu lam yang skyo bar 'gyur //
translated: The path of the teats is long, and the child is often wearied.

original: nyi ma so sor dam pa ma yin don gnyer rnams la rab bskul pha yang khro ba 'dzin //
analyzed: nyi ma so sor dam pa ma yin don gnyer rnams la rab bskul pha yang khro ba 'dzin //
translated: Day after day, you are solicited by those who ask for what is improper, and you are angry.

original: 'jig rten gyi ni re 'dod 'bras bus yangs ldan dpag bsam shing chen 'khri shing mchog ni khyod //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi ni re 'dod 'bras bus yangs ldan dpag bsam shing chen 'khri shing mchog ni khyod //
translated: You are the great wishing-tree of the world, the creeper of fulfillment of desires,

original: mngon par don gnyer don rnams kun la stsol gyi nam yang rnam gyur de dag ci yang med //
analyzed: mngon par don gnyer don rnams kun la stsol gyi nam yang rnam gyur de dag ci yang med //
translated: the bestower of all that is asked for, and never failing.

original: gang la nyon mongs tshogs kyi me 'bar lus can de dang de yis sgrol ma nga nyid cis //
analyzed: gang la nyon mongs tshogs kyi me 'bar lus can de dang de yis sgrol ma nga nyid cis //
translated: Why do you not deliver from the fire of the afflictions those who are burning in it?

original: bdag nyid zhal bzhes dam bcas sdug bsngal 'og tu bying ba bdag la 'bras bu ldan par mdzod //
analyzed: bdag nyid zhal bzhes dam bcas sdug bsngal 'og tu bying ba bdag la 'bras bu ldan par mdzod //
translated: You have promised, you have vowed, O TƒÅrƒÅ, to be the refuge of those who are sinking in the ocean of suffering.

original: srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal shugs ni rtsub cing zil gnon 'di dag ji snyed 'phel gyur pa //
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal shugs ni rtsub cing zil gnon 'di dag ji snyed 'phel gyur pa //
translated: The suffering of living beings is violent and overwhelming, and it increases.

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam blo mnga' rnams kyi brtse ba'ang de snyed nyid //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam blo mnga' rnams kyi brtse ba'ang de snyed nyid //
translated: The compassion of those who have the mind of aspiration for the vehicle of perfect, complete Buddhahood is also that much.

original: de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gi zol gyis cho nge'i sgra dag gsang mthon sgrogs shing lag bsgreng la /
analyzed: de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gi zol gyis cho nge'i sgra dag gsang mthon sgrogs shing lag bsgreng la /
translated: Thus, with the pretense of words of praise, with the sound of wailing, with arms raised,

original: gzhan dag gis kyang btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na yum gcig khyod kyis lta yang ci //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis kyang btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na yum gcig khyod kyis lta yang ci //
translated: if it is not proper for others to remain indifferent, what about you, O Mother?

original: gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor par 'dod pa khyed las thob pa rnams mthong bzhin //
analyzed: gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor par 'dod pa khyed las thob pa rnams mthong bzhin //
translated: While seeing those who are desired by others, who are desired to be wealthy, obtained from you,

original: mi dge las byung nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags bzod blag med pas shin tu yang yang sreg / gal te kho bo sdig can lags na khyod la gus pa chen po 'di ni ci phyir 'phel //
analyzed: mi dge las byung nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags bzod blag med pas shin tu yang yang sreg / gal te kho bo sdig can lags na khyod la gus pa chen po 'di ni ci phyir 'phel //
translated: they are continuously burned by unbearable inner torment arising from non-virtuous actions. If I am a sinner, why does this great respect for you increase?

original: khyod nyid gcig pu'i mtshan gyis kyang ni thos dang dran pas 'phral la sdig pa sel bar byed //
analyzed: khyod nyid gcig pu'i mtshan gyis kyang ni thos dang dran pas 'phral la sdig pa sel bar byed //
translated: Your name alone, when heard or remembered, immediately dispels evil.

original: de lta na yang bdag gi bya ba'i khur dag dong ba ji ltar lags zhes bden gsungs pa //
analyzed: de lta na yang bdag gi bya ba'i khur dag dong ba ji ltar lags zhes bden gsungs pa //
translated: Yet, as you have said, the burden of my actions must be borne.

original: nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur yang sman pa'i snying rje rgya chen phan pa khon par bgyid dam ci //
analyzed: nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur yang sman pa'i snying rje rgya chen phan pa khon par bgyid dam ci //
translated: Is it not the case that the doctor‚Äôs great compassion and helpfulness continue even when the patient dies?

original: sgyu mang ser sna nga rgyal phrag dog rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis dus mnyam rim par yang //
analyzed: sgyu mang ser sna nga rgyal phrag dog rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis dus mnyam rim par yang //
translated: The many who are full of deceit, avarice, pride, and envy, and who are wicked in their own ways,

original: du ma dag gi thun mong char gyur tshogs khang rnga mo bzhin du bskor bar gyur pas na //
analyzed: du ma dag gi thun mong char gyur tshogs khang rnga mo bzhin du bskor bar gyur pas na //
translated: are all gathered together in the assembly hall of the many, like a herd of camels.üîΩFor the sake of those who have not found even a moment to worship at your lotus feet,

original: khyed kyi zhabs pad mchod pa skad @39b cig tsam yang ma rnyed gang de'i don du khyad par las //
analyzed: khyed kyi zhabs pad mchod pa skad @39b cig tsam yang ma rnyed gang de'i don du khyad par las //
translated: you have made a special effort.

original: phongs pas yi ge dman par tshig 'di bkod do bdag gi 'dod pa don med ma gyur cig / dus mtha'i rlung rab 'khrugs pas dkrugs pa'i chu ni g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rlung 'khor ral pa can //
analyzed: phongs pas yi ge dman par tshig 'di bkod do bdag gi 'dod pa don med ma gyur cig / dus mtha'i rlung rab 'khrugs pas dkrugs pa'i chu ni g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rlung 'khor ral pa can //
translated: The water, churned by the violent winds at the end of the world, is a wheel of moving and shaking winds.

original: rab 'khrugs kun du bskyod cing rba rlabs ngos brdabs sgra grag gad rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa las //üîΩgru chag chu ru snying rje du ba'i tshe de dang ldan g-yo ba med cing zhan gyur pa //
analyzed: rab 'khrugs kun du bskyod cing rba rlabs ngos brdabs sgra grag gad rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa las // gru chag chu ru snying rje du ba'i tshe de dang ldan g-yo ba med cing zhan gyur pa //
translated: It is violently agitated, and the waves crash against each other with a great roar.üîΩWhen the ship is wrecked and the water is full of wailing, you, O Goddess, who are full of compassion, are unmoving and weak.

original: lha mo khyod la bstod pa rnams kyis 'phral la chu gter 'gram du rang dga' thar bar 'gyur //üîΩdu ba 'tshubs pa sprin 'dra khong nas rab byung me stag mkha' khyim nang du rnam par rgyu //
analyzed: lha mo khyod la bstod pa rnams kyis 'phral la chu gter 'gram du rang dga' thar bar 'gyur // du ba 'tshubs pa sprin 'dra khong nas rab byung me stag mkha' khyim nang du rnam par rgyu //
translated: By praising you, the ship will immediately be happy and saved on the shore of the ocean.üîΩSmoke, like a cloud, rises from within, and sparks of fire move through the sky and into the house.

original: me dpung me lce 'phro zhing rab 'bar drag po'i khang par mal stan dag la rab 'khod pa //
analyzed: me dpung me lce 'phro zhing rab 'bar drag po'i khang par mal stan dag la rab 'khod pa //
translated: The fire, with its spreading flames, fiercely burns in the house, and the bed is completely engulfed in flames.

original: thal sbyar cod pan ldan pas khyed la btud byas ldab ldib dag tu gsol ba 'debs pa rnams //
analyzed: thal sbyar cod pan ldan pas khyed la btud byas ldab ldib dag tu gsol ba 'debs pa rnams //
translated: With joined hands uplifted, with a diadem upon his brow, he bowed before you and entreated you in faltering accents:

original: glog rab 'gyur ba'i rtse dga' rab 'bar chu 'dzin shugs kyis skad cig nyid la sgrib par byed //
analyzed: glog rab 'gyur ba'i rtse dga' rab 'bar chu 'dzin shugs kyis skad cig nyid la sgrib par byed //
translated: The lightning's flash, a wanton dancing-girl, is hidden by the clouds, the wind's strong arms.

original: myos pa'i chu rgyas 'gram pa gnyis ka'i ngos la babs pas bung ba dag gi phreng ba can //
analyzed: myos pa'i chu rgyas 'gram pa gnyis ka'i ngos la babs pas bung ba dag gi phreng ba can //
translated: The water-laden clouds descend upon the mountain-breast, and form a garland for the bees.

original: h'um zhes bya bas bos par gyur ba'i gling chen zla bos zhe sdang me spar gnyis 'thung gi //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya bas bos par gyur ba'i gling chen zla bos zhe sdang me spar gnyis 'thung gi //
translated: The moon, the messenger of Humkara, the lover of the moon, drinks the fire of love,

original: so rtse rab tu mtho ba'i khyogs la blangs pa'i lus can dag gis khyod rjes dran pa na //
analyzed: so rtse rab tu mtho ba'i khyogs la blangs pa'i lus can dag gis khyod rjes dran pa na //
translated: and, borne upon a litter by the men whose teeth are sharp, remembers you.

original: rtse mo che ldan mgo rtse'i rdzong la 'dug cing rab tu dga' bas 'chi bdag phyir zlog byed //
analyzed: rtse mo che ldan mgo rtse'i rdzong la 'dug cing rab tu dga' bas 'chi bdag phyir zlog byed //
translated: He sits upon the summit of the mountain peak, and with delight repels the messengers of death.

original: mdung rings drag pos bsnun bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing dag gi 'khri shing dga' ston can //
analyzed: mdung rings drag pos bsnun bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing dag gi 'khri shing dga' ston can //
translated: The trees are decked with garlands of the heads of men, impaled upon long pikes, and slain by the fierce spear-thrusts of the Yakshas.

original: nags tshal stong par chom rkun lag rtses ral gri g-yo zhing brdeg par gzas pas dregs rgyas pa //
analyzed: nags tshal stong par chom rkun lag rtses ral gri g-yo zhing brdeg par gzas pas dregs rgyas pa //
translated: In the empty forest, the bandits, with their hands on their swords, are ready to strike.

original: khro gnyer dang bcas smin 'khyog zur mig gis bltas mig can rnams ni khyed mtshan dpal gyi gzhi //
analyzed: khro gnyer dang bcas smin 'khyog zur mig gis bltas mig can rnams ni khyed mtshan dpal gyi gzhi //
translated: But the eyes of the proud, with their crooked, frowning glances, are the eyes of those who look upon you as the basis of glory.

original: gsal bar 'dri ba'i gnas la bsam pa'i smyu gu skyo med rnams kyis bran du bkol bar byed //
analyzed: gsal bar 'dri ba'i gnas la bsam pa'i smyu gu skyo med rnams kyis bran du bkol bar byed //
translated: The pens of thought, which are never tired, are employed to write clearly about the subject.

original: rab rno sder mo'i rtse ni rdo rje lta bur bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i klad 'gems nas //
analyzed: rab rno sder mo'i rtse ni rdo rje lta bur bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i klad 'gems nas //
translated: The tip of the sharp claws, which are like diamonds, pierces the head of the crazy elephant.

original: khrag mang rab tu zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung yangs phrag pa khebs //
analyzed: khrag mang rab tu zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung yangs phrag pa khebs //
translated: The hair, which is washed by the flowing blood, is clear and covers the broad shoulders.

original: khros te rgyang nas steng du 'phyong 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dgas dgra //
analyzed: khros te rgyang nas steng du 'phyong 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dgas dgra //
translated: The lion, who is angry and wants to jump up from a distance, has a mouth with sharp fangs.

original: khyod la 'os pa'i bstod pa don ldan tshig dag @40a * //
analyzed: khyod la 'os pa'i bstod pa don ldan tshig dag @40a * //
translated: The meaningful words of praise, which are suitable for you,üîΩare arranged.

original: bkod pas skrag ste log nas 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bkod pas skrag ste log nas 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: Frightened, he turns back and goes away.

original: gdengs can rnam 'gyur du ba'i khyim dang mun pa'i dbyibs can gsal bar phud sgra dag gi tshogs //
analyzed: gdengs can rnam 'gyur du ba'i khyim dang mun pa'i dbyibs can gsal bar phud sgra dag gi tshogs //
translated: The serpent, with its hood expanded, its form dark as the raincloud, is clearly seen.üîΩWith its jaws wide open, its tongue darting out like Yama's noose, it is huge and quivering.

original: byed pa dang ldan kha gdangs ro 'dzin thag pa gshin rje'i zhags 'dra che zhing g-yo ba dag / sdig pa las byung slar yang khyod skyong bdag nyid khyod kyi yon tan bgrang bar lhur len pas //
analyzed: byed pa dang ldan kha gdangs ro 'dzin thag pa gshin rje'i zhags 'dra che zhing g-yo ba dag / sdig pa las byung slar yang khyod skyong bdag nyid khyod kyi yon tan bgrang bar lhur len pas //
translated: But you, O protector, are intent on counting its virtues, which have sprung from sin.

original: autpala phreng ba'i rgyan gyis 'byor pa bung ba myos pa'i phreng bas dkris ltar 'dzin par 'gyur //üîΩrje bo'i smin ma bskyod pas 'jigs pa dag gis rgod cing 'phyag pas drangs la co dog gzings //
analyzed: autpala phreng ba'i rgyan gyis 'byor pa bung ba myos pa'i phreng bas dkris ltar 'dzin par 'gyur // rje bo'i smin ma bskyod pas 'jigs pa dag gis rgod cing 'phyag pas drangs la co dog gzings //
translated: You will hold it, as if it were a garland of utpala flowers, entwined with a string of intoxicated bees.üîΩThe trembling of your master's brow, alarmed, will cause you to tremble and to tremble.

original: g-yo zhing sgra sgrogs bran khol rnams kyis rtsub mor smra byed zhags pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings //
analyzed: g-yo zhing sgra sgrogs bran khol rnams kyis rtsub mor smra byed zhags pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings //
translated: You will be bound with a tight noose, scolded by your trembling, noisy, and harsh-speaking servants.

original: bkres skom dag gis kha dang mgrin skams gang zhig 'phag ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba //
analyzed: bkres skom dag gis kha dang mgrin skams gang zhig 'phag ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba //
translated: You, who are thirsty and hungry, your mouth and throat parched, will go for refuge to the feet of the noble Tara.

original: de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis spangs kyang mtha' med rgud pa de dag 'phral du gtor bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis spangs kyang mtha' med rgud pa de dag 'phral du gtor bar 'gyur //
translated: The kinsmen of love may abandon them, but they immediately destroy those endless misfortunes.

original: sgyu ma 'phrul pa'i lam gyi rim pas rnam par 'gyur ba du ma dag gis chas byas shing //
analyzed: sgyu ma 'phrul pa'i lam gyi rim pas rnam par 'gyur ba du ma dag gis chas byas shing //
translated: They are adorned with many transformations by the stages of the path of magical illusion.

original: log pa'i gzugs tsam rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mi bzad ldan //
analyzed: log pa'i gzugs tsam rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mi bzad ldan //
translated: They are endowed with a terrible mass of weapon-light rays that are suitable for just a false form.

original: mi ro las bton rgyu ma'i thag pa'i tshogs kyi phreng bas rnam par spras pa'i srin po rnams //
analyzed: mi ro las bton rgyu ma'i thag pa'i tshogs kyi phreng bas rnam par spras pa'i srin po rnams //
translated: The rƒÅk·π£asas are adorned with a garland of strings of entrails drawn from human corpses.

original: khyed rgyud las btus gsang sngags dran pas sdig pa phrogs pa'i srung ma gzhom med byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyed rgyud las btus gsang sngags dran pas sdig pa phrogs pa'i srung ma gzhom med byed par 'gyur //
translated: You will become an invincible protector who robs the sins of those who remember the mantra extracted from the tantras.

original: glang chen sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can myos byed chu bo'i rgyun dang ldan pas mun gtibs shing //
analyzed: glang chen sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can myos byed chu bo'i rgyun dang ldan pas mun gtibs shing //
translated: The body of the elephant-roaring rain cloud is covered with a stream of the flow of liquor.

original: mtshon cha 'od zer rnams ni glog rab 'gyu ltar rab gsal mda' yi char 'bab g-yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe //
analyzed: mtshon cha 'od zer rnams ni glog rab 'gyu ltar rab gsal mda' yi char 'bab g-yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe //
translated: At the time of battle, the light rays of the weapons are like the flickering lightning, and the rain of arrows falls.

original: rnam par snang ba'i dgra bo dpung pa'i stobs ni rab mchog ldan pa rnams kyis bkag gyur pa //
analyzed: rnam par snang ba'i dgra bo dpung pa'i stobs ni rab mchog ldan pa rnams kyis bkag gyur pa //
translated: The enemy of the light, the one with the most powerful arms, has been stopped.üîΩYour enemy, the hero of killing, suddenly crushed the enemy‚Äôs base to dust.

original: khyod kyi dgra bo gsod pa'i dpa' bo gcig gis 'phral du dgra yis gzhi phye mar rlog / sdig spyod dag gi rjes 'brang phol mig chabs can dag las rnag khrag rul pa rab 'dzag cing //
analyzed: khyod kyi dgra bo gsod pa'i dpa' bo gcig gis 'phral du dgra yis gzhi phye mar rlog / sdig spyod dag gi rjes 'brang phol mig chabs can dag las rnag khrag rul pa rab 'dzag cing //
translated: The followers of the evildoers, the ones with eye-popping mouths, ooze pus and blood from their rotting wounds.

original: sha lpags myags pa la chags rtsa yi sgo yi bu gar 'gul ba'i srog chags kyis zos lus zad rnams //
analyzed: sha lpags myags pa la chags rtsa yi sgo yi bu gar 'gul ba'i srog chags kyis zos lus zad rnams //
translated: Their flesh and skin rot, and the openings of their pulsating veins are eaten by wriggling worms.

original: khyod zhabs nye bar brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu gus shing chags pa yis //
analyzed: khyod zhabs nye bar brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu gus shing chags pa yis //
translated: The supreme medicine that is close to your feet, the pill of devotion and attachment,

original: sa le sbram dang mtshungs @40b pa'i lus dang padma dkar po ltar yangs mig dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa le sbram dang mtshungs @40b pa'i lus dang padma dkar po ltar yangs mig dang ldan par 'gyur //
translated: makes the body like gold and the eyes like white lotuses.

original: gang gi rna ba'i snod na bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba'i man ngag slong mo mi gnas shing //
analyzed: gang gi rna ba'i snod na bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba'i man ngag slong mo mi gnas shing //
translated: In the vessel of the ears, the instructions given by the gurus do not beg for alms.

original: thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams dag tu lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang //
analyzed: thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs rnams dag tu lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang //
translated: And, being destitute of the wealth of learning, you have acknowledged yourself to be dumb in the assemblies of the wise.

original: de yang khyed la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams thams cad mdzes byed 'byor par bcas pa yis //
analyzed: de yang khyed la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams thams cad mdzes byed 'byor par bcas pa yis //
translated: Moreover, by the power of your devotion to him, all your ornaments, with their beauty and splendour,

original: ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed //
translated: have been transferred to the lion-thrones of the disputants in the presence of the king, after they have been deprived of their eloquence by the lord of speech.

original: sa gzhi mal stan rdul gyis lus bsgos skyed ngos ras ral yan lag dag ni rnam par mngon //
analyzed: sa gzhi mal stan rdul gyis lus bsgos skyed ngos ras ral yan lag dag ni rnam par mngon //
translated: The dust of the earth, which has been your bed, has soiled your body, and the ragged cloth your side.

original: shig gi tshe dag rab gtser gzhan gyi grong khyer mdun du g-yo mor zas ni don gnyer ba //
analyzed: shig gi tshe dag rab gtser gzhan gyi grong khyer mdun du g-yo mor zas ni don gnyer ba //
translated: You have been tormented by the bites of lice, and you have gone about begging for food in the houses of strangers.

original: khyod mnyes bgyid la brtson pas na chung mchog gis bzung ba'i rnga yab 'dzum gyis rab mdzes shing //
analyzed: khyod mnyes bgyid la brtson pas na chung mchog gis bzung ba'i rnga yab 'dzum gyis rab mdzes shing //
translated: But, striving to please him, you have been taken as a wife by a young girl of the highest rank, and you have obtained an umbrella, beautiful with its fringe of peacock‚Äôs tail-feathers,

original: myos pas long ba'i gnyis 'thung sos gtams gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa'i sa gzhi 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: myos pas long ba'i gnyis 'thung sos gtams gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa'i sa gzhi 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: and a single elephant, which, intoxicated, and with its ichor flowing, raises its trunk on high and supports the earth.

original: g-yog dang las mtha' bzo dang dbang po gso ba'i thabs kyi rnam grangs dag gis rab skyo zhing //
analyzed: g-yog dang las mtha' bzo dang dbang po gso ba'i thabs kyi rnam grangs dag gis rab skyo zhing //
translated: The various means of livelihood, of work, of healing the sick, are all exhausted.

original: skye ba snga mar rab bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa'i dge 'bras nor ni thob par ma gyur ba'i //
analyzed: skye ba snga mar rab bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa'i dge 'bras nor ni thob par ma gyur ba'i //
translated: The wealth which is the fruit of the merit acquired in former lives is not to be had.

original: nor med rnams kyis skye bo bkres pa'i yum gyur phongs las 'da' bar mdzad pa khyod la don //
analyzed: nor med rnams kyis skye bo bkres pa'i yum gyur phongs las 'da' bar mdzad pa khyod la don //
translated: The poor, who are the mothers of hunger, are not to be relieved.

original: don du gnyer na slar yang gser gyi tshogs kyi gter dag sa las 'thon pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: don du gnyer na slar yang gser gyi tshogs kyi gter dag sa las 'thon pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: If you seek wealth, you will find it, as if it were a treasure of gold, rising up from the earth.

original: 'tsho ba chad las ngo tshar gyur cing gos zad chung ma dag gis rab tu spyo bar byed //
analyzed: 'tsho ba chad las ngo tshar gyur cing gos zad chung ma dag gis rab tu spyo bar byed //
translated: You are ashamed of begging for your daily bread; your wife scolds you for wearing out your clothes.

original: bdag nyid gso phyir rang gi skye bo bu dang grogs po gnyen gyis ring du spangs pa yis //
analyzed: bdag nyid gso phyir rang gi skye bo bu dang grogs po gnyen gyis ring du spangs pa yis //
translated: Your own people, your children and friends, avoid you, lest they be charged with your support.

original: khyed la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras //
analyzed: khyed la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras //
translated: You have told your own sorrows to the women of the house, who are busy with their bracelets.

original: gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byed //
analyzed: gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byed //
translated: The lord of the house, who is marked with the horse-hoofs, is asleep and awake.

original: 'khor lo phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sbyor bud med mtshan brgyan 'od zer g-yo zhing che ba dang // glang chen gtso bo mche ba drug ldan rta mchog spu kha sngo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher //üîΩnor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar gsal dri med yon tan mdzod 'dzin mdzod khengs dang // dmag dpon dpal sde ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas phra @41a * //
analyzed: 'khor lo phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sbyor bud med mtshan brgyan 'od zer g-yo zhing che ba dang // glang chen gtso bo mche ba drug ldan rta mchog spu kha sngo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher // nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar gsal dri med yon tan mdzod 'dzin mdzod khengs dang // dmag dpon dpal sde ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas phra @41a * //
translated: The wheel, the wheel of the directions, the application, the woman, the ornament, the light, the movement, the great, the chief elephant, the six tusks, the horse, the excellent, the hair, the blue-black, the peacock, the throat,

original: las 'gyur // tsandan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo la mdzes mas dus btab rtse dga' la chags pas //üîΩsdu gu ma yi bde ba'i nyer spyad mgron du bya ba mngon par gsang ba rab bsgrubs shing //
analyzed: las 'gyur // tsandan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo la mdzes mas dus btab rtse dga' la chags pas //üîΩsdu gu ma yi bde ba'i nyer spyad mgron du bya ba mngon par gsang ba rab bsgrubs shing //
translated: the jewel, the sun, the light-ray, the clear, the stainless, the treasure, the qualities, the holder, the treasure, the full, the general, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious, the glorious

original: ral gri 'od zer gyis sdo spom mtho dpung pa gtun shing dang 'dva dpung rgyan rol pa can //
analyzed: ral gri 'od zer gyis sdo spom mtho dpung pa gtun shing dang 'dva dpung rgyan rol pa can //
translated: The sword-rays, of a dark blue colour, are as high as the shoulder, and are adorned with a garland of palm-leaves.

original: khyod kyi rigs drug rig 'dzin dbang po ma la ya yi me tog tshal du rang dgar 'gro //
analyzed: khyod kyi rigs drug rig 'dzin dbang po ma la ya yi me tog tshal du rang dgar 'gro //
translated: The six classes of your family, O chief of the VidyƒÅdharas, go freely to the garden of the Malya flowers.

original: nu ma'i thon 'khor do shal gyis brgyan mig dkyus ring po rna ba'i autpala la 'gran cing //
analyzed: nu ma'i thon 'khor do shal gyis brgyan mig dkyus ring po rna ba'i autpala la 'gran cing //
translated: Your breasts are adorned with necklaces, your eyes are long, and rival the blue lotus of your ears.

original: lha mo yid 'ong manda ra ba dang ldan ze 'bru gsar pa'i dris myos bung ba can //
analyzed: lha mo yid 'ong manda ra ba dang ldan ze 'bru gsar pa'i dris myos bung ba can //
translated: O goddess, you are charming like a Mandara flower, and the bees are intoxicated by the fragrance of your fresh pistils.

original: dril chung sgra yis rjes 'brel rab tu gsal bar rkang gdub yid 'ong sgra snyan sgrogs par byed //
analyzed: dril chung sgra yis rjes 'brel rab tu gsal bar rkang gdub yid 'ong sgra snyan sgrogs par byed //
translated: The sound of your girdle is followed by the sweet sound of your anklets.

original: 'dod pas myos dga' gzhon nu ma rnams gus dang bcas par khyed mgon ldan pa don du gnyer //
analyzed: 'dod pas myos dga' gzhon nu ma rnams gus dang bcas par khyed mgon ldan pa don du gnyer //
translated: The young women, intoxicated with love, long for you, O protector, with respect.

original: rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad ldan ze'u 'bru rdo rje phreng ba can //
analyzed: rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad ldan ze'u 'bru rdo rje phreng ba can //
translated: The interior of the pond is adorned with jewels, and the golden lotus has a pericarp with a vajra garland.

original: yongs 'du'i ljon pa las 'phro dri bzang dang ldan me tog rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te //
analyzed: yongs 'du'i ljon pa las 'phro dri bzang dang ldan me tog rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te //
translated: The trees of the garden of paradise, which are covered with flowers and emit a sweet perfume, will form a canopy for you.

original: pi wang gling bu sgrogs mkhas lha yi grong gi dga' ba rnams kyis snyan par rab bsgrags pa'i //
analyzed: pi wang gling bu sgrogs mkhas lha yi grong gi dga' ba rnams kyis snyan par rab bsgrags pa'i //
translated: The sounds of the lute and the flute, which are so delightful in the celestial cities, will be heard by you.

original: dga' ba'i skyed tshal bgrod pa khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun ring nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dga' ba'i skyed tshal bgrod pa khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun ring nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
translated: You will enjoy for a long time the pleasures of the garden of paradise, which are offered to you in worship.

original: nang gi byed pa khyod la gtad pa'i bsod nams mthu ni rab 'bar yongs su smin pa yis //
analyzed: nang gi byed pa khyod la gtad pa'i bsod nams mthu ni rab 'bar yongs su smin pa yis //
translated: The power of the merit which you have accumulated by your good deeds will be increased and will ripen.

original: ga pur ae la li shi shun pa aa ka ru dang na la da phye'i dri ldan chu //
analyzed: ga pur ae la li shi shun pa aa ka ru dang na la da phye'i dri ldan chu //
translated: You will bathe in water which has the fragrance of camphor, of jasmine, of the bark of the aksha tree, of sandalwood, and of the nalada plant.

original: 'dod pa'i dregs pas rab 'bur bud med nu ma'i skyibs su rba rlabs 'khyil gnas dal 'bab pa //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dregs pas rab 'bur bud med nu ma'i skyibs su rba rlabs 'khyil gnas dal 'bab pa //
translated: You will sport with beautiful women, who are like waves in the ocean of the breasts of the women of paradise, which is agitated by the passion of love.

original: sman min chu yi zer ma dang ldan chu rtsed mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig rtse bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sman min chu yi zer ma dang ldan chu rtsed mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig rtse bar 'gyur //
translated: You will play in the water with the beautiful women, who are not like the waves of the ocean, which are not made of water, but of foam.

original: tshig mtha'i gtso bo dul ba'i khur gyis cod pan dud pa rnams kyis bka' la phyag byas shing //
analyzed: tshig mtha'i gtso bo dul ba'i khur gyis cod pan dud pa rnams kyis bka' la phyag byas shing //
translated: The sages, their crowns bent down with the weight of the garland of the final words, bowed to the command.

original: mtho ris steng du lha yis glang chen khrol khrol rgyan gyis spud pa'i lus can la zhon te //
analyzed: mtho ris steng du lha yis glang chen khrol khrol rgyan gyis spud pa'i lus can la zhon te //
translated: The gods, mounted on elephants with swaying ornaments, in the upper realms,

original: spu lang dang rgyas lus can bde sogs lag pa'i thag pa khyogs kyis rgyun du bskyil gyur pa //
analyzed: spu lang dang rgyas lus can bde sogs lag pa'i thag pa khyogs kyis rgyun du bskyil gyur pa //
translated: their bodies covered with goose bumps and bristling with joy, their hands bound in ropes of bliss,

original: khyed kyi spyan ras phog pas dag byas lag pa rdo rje ldan pa'i lhas skyong byed //
analyzed: khyed kyi spyan ras phog pas dag byas lag pa rdo rje ldan pa'i lhas skyong byed //
translated: are purified by the glance of your compassion, and are protected by the gods who possess the vajra in their hands.

original: gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis mnan bzhugs bde bar gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal 'byor bla re can //
analyzed: gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis mnan bzhugs bde bar gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal 'byor bla re can //
translated: The Sugata, the glory of the sky, with a canopy of jewels pressed down on his crown,

original: nyi ma @41b 'char ka bye ba lta bur rab gsal 'od zer rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing //
analyzed: nyi ma @41b 'char ka bye ba lta bur rab gsal 'od zer rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing //
translated: with the expansion of his bright light rays, shining like ten million rising suns, filling the three worlds,

original: brtan par g-yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis mnan khur gyis tshangs dbang drag po khyab 'jug rnams 'dud pa'i //
analyzed: brtan par g-yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis mnan khur gyis tshangs dbang drag po khyab 'jug rnams 'dud pa'i //
translated: with one foot firmly planted, right leg extended, pressing down on the earth, bowing to Shiva, Indra, and Vishnu,

original: khyed sku bsgoms pa skye ba la brten rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa gcod pa'i slad du 'gyur //
analyzed: khyed sku bsgoms pa skye ba la brten rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa gcod pa'i slad du 'gyur //
translated: For those who meditate on your form, who are born in the world, you are the one who cuts off the fear of existence.

original: khro ba dang bcas mtshon cha'i 'od zer rab 'bar phyag dbyig cha yis nam mkha'i khongs dag khyab //
analyzed: khro ba dang bcas mtshon cha'i 'od zer rab 'bar phyag dbyig cha yis nam mkha'i khongs dag khyab //
translated: With wrathful light rays blazing from your weapons, your mighty hand fills the realm of space.

original: gdu bu'i gdengs can dag gi gdengs ka mi bzad mi 'phrogs spyod ldan sdang rnams skrag mdzad bzhad //
analyzed: gdu bu'i gdengs can dag gi gdengs ka mi bzad mi 'phrogs spyod ldan sdang rnams skrag mdzad bzhad //
translated: With the terrifying, invincible hood of your coiled serpent armlet, you terrify the hateful ones with your laughter.

original: cang te'u drag po tshabs cher brdungs pa'i tshe na ro langs rnams ni drag por pheg rdob cing //
analyzed: cang te'u drag po tshabs cher brdungs pa'i tshe na ro langs rnams ni drag por pheg rdob cing //
translated: When the fierce and powerful skull-drum is beaten, the zombies make a fierce and powerful sound.

original: bag med rgyas pas ca co chen po sgrogs par byed pa'i drag mor la la dag gis mthong //
analyzed: bag med rgyas pas ca co chen po sgrogs par byed pa'i drag mor la la dag gis mthong //
translated: Some see you as a fierce one, with a great deal of nonsense, due to the abundance of carelessness.

original: la las ba spu re re las byung nam mkha'i khyon gnas sa dang sa 'og dag na gnas //
analyzed: la las ba spu re re las byung nam mkha'i khyon gnas sa dang sa 'og dag na gnas //
translated: Some see you as emanating from each pore, filling the realm of space, and dwelling in the earth and underworld.

original: mtho ris la gnas tshangs dbang drag po la sogs mi dang lha dang grub pa'i dri za klu //
analyzed: mtho ris la gnas tshangs dbang drag po la sogs mi dang lha dang grub pa'i dri za klu //
translated: Some see you as dwelling in the higher realms, as Brahma, Indra, Shiva, and so forth, as gods, humans, siddhas, gandharvas, and nagas.

original: phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas dag gi sku //
analyzed: phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas dag gi sku //
translated: In the rays of light that pervade the universe, you are the bodies of the infinite emanations of the hundred sugatas.

original: ngo mtshar 'jig rten gsum gyi phyag 'os brtan g-yo bkod pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor ro //
analyzed: ngo mtshar 'jig rten gsum gyi phyag 'os brtan g-yo bkod pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor ro //
translated: You are the essence of all the things that make up the stable and moving universe, the object of homage of the three worlds.üîΩSome see you as extremely red, like the color of lac or the setting sun;

original: la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon dang nyi zhon dmar ba nyid ltar shin tu dmar ba dang // de bzhin gzhan gyis snum zhing 'od ldan mthon mthing rdo bcag btags pa'i phye ma ltar sdo dang // la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i 'od ltar ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od lta bu ste //
analyzed: la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon dang nyi zhon dmar ba nyid ltar shin tu dmar ba dang // de bzhin gzhan gyis snum zhing 'od ldan mthon mthing rdo bcag btags pa'i phye ma ltar sdo dang // la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i 'od ltar ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od lta bu ste //
translated: some as dark blue, shiny and radiant, like the powder of crushed sapphires; some as white, brighter than the light of the churning of the milky ocean; and some as golden.

original: khyed sku sna tshogs ngo bo nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad shel bzhin no //
analyzed: khyed sku sna tshogs ngo bo nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad shel bzhin no //
translated: Your bodies are different, like crystal, because of the different ways they are related to the essence that is present.

original: kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mas shes bya mtha' dag gsal byas de nyid dag gi dbang gcig pu //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mas shes bya mtha' dag gsal byas de nyid dag gi dbang gcig pu //
translated: The light of the wisdom of omniscience illuminates all objects of knowledge, and you are the sole lord of reality.

original: kun rig nyid dam de yi sras kyis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni mngon sum mkhyen //
analyzed: kun rig nyid dam de yi sras kyis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni mngon sum mkhyen //
translated: The son of Samantabhadra, who knows the number of your virtues, knows them directly.

original: bdag 'dra gtor ma spyod pa sgrogs pa lta bur kha gdangs ku co che bar 'don pa gang //
analyzed: bdag 'dra gtor ma spyod pa sgrogs pa lta bur kha gdangs ku co che bar 'don pa gang //
translated: I, who am like a fool who makes a great noise with an empty mouth,

original: de ni mi bzad sdug bsngal gdung bas nad bskyed sems kyi rgud pa bzhad gad dag gi rgyu //
analyzed: de ni mi bzad sdug bsngal gdung bas nad bskyed sems kyi rgud pa bzhad gad dag gi rgyu //
translated: am the cause of the mental depression and laughter of those who are tormented by the unbearable suffering of illness.üîΩYou, who are the first to know the request that I make,

original: bdag gis zhu ba gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyed kyis khyad par du mkhyen te //üîΩ'on kyang lhag par de brjod ngal ba'i sgrub byed mi @42a * //
analyzed: bdag gis zhu ba gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyed kyis khyad par du mkhyen te // 'on kyang lhag par de brjod ngal ba'i sgrub byed mi @42a * //
translated: know it in particular,

original: mkhas bdag rang sems tshim pa yi rgyu //üîΩdon shes zin yang gnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du sdug bsngal ldan pas tshig gis sdug bsngal ni //
analyzed: mkhas bdag rang sems tshim pa yi rgyu // don shes zin yang gnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du sdug bsngal ldan pas tshig gis sdug bsngal ni //
translated: but I, who am skilled in the means of accomplishing the satisfaction of my own mind,üîΩspeak of it again and again.üîΩJust as one who has vomited poison feels nauseated even at the memory of it,

original: dug bzhin skyugs par gyur na snying yang seng zhes byed cing rnam par gnas par tshor ba bzhin //
analyzed: dug bzhin skyugs par gyur na snying yang seng zhes byed cing rnam par gnas par tshor ba bzhin //
translated: so I, who am full of suffering, speak of my suffering in the presence of my loving friends.

original: dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal po bsil ba'i gzigs par stsal du gsol //
analyzed: dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal po bsil ba'i gzigs par stsal du gsol //
translated: Grant me the vision of the moon, cool and clear, rising from the ocean of all that is good and virtuous.

original: ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod cig thugs rjes sdig ldan nang gi mun pa sel //
analyzed: ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod cig thugs rjes sdig ldan nang gi mun pa sel //
translated: With the light of your wisdom, expand the lotus of my mind; with your compassion, dispel the darkness of my sins.

original: gang phyir 'gro ba dag na khyod bstod chu yis yid ni dag par byas pa kho bo la //
analyzed: gang phyir 'gro ba dag na khyod bstod chu yis yid ni dag par byas pa kho bo la //
translated: Since the water of your praise has purified my mind,

original: skye dgu rnams kyi dge legs gnas ni don yod khyod kyi yon tan bstod tsam gcig pu mthong //
analyzed: skye dgu rnams kyi dge legs gnas ni don yod khyod kyi yon tan bstod tsam gcig pu mthong //
translated: I see that the only source of good for all beings is you, the unfailing one.

original: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag gis 'di tsam zhes par ma nges pa'i //
analyzed: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag gis 'di tsam zhes par ma nges pa'i //
translated: I have praised only a fraction of your many qualities, and so I cannot say, ‚ÄúI have finished.‚Äù

original: bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ro myang 'gro ba'i bar du spyad bya ba //
analyzed: bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ro myang 'gro ba'i bar du spyad bya ba //
translated: The fruit of my desire is merit and good fortune, which I will enjoy until I reach the state of immortality.

original: gang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi //
analyzed: gang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi //
translated: By this, may the world attain the auspicious soles of the feet of the noble Lord of the World.

original: bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i sa gzhi bde ba can zhes bya de myur du bgrod bar shog / phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa pandi ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ba shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i sa gzhi bde ba can zhes bya de myur du bgrod bar shog / phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa pandi ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ba shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of the holder of the rosary, composed by the great pandit, the omniscient Vasubandhu, is complete.
